abstract: Stocks rise briskly as oil prices climb.

headline.print_headline: Oil Price Soars and Shares Rise
headline.main: Market Rises on Gains in Oil Prices and Earnings

snippet: Wall Street was higher for the third day in a row, buoyed also by a pickup in factory output. The rally has erased about half of this year’s losses.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street was higher for the third day in a row, buoyed also by a pickup in factory output. The rally has erased about half of this year’s losses.
